text: geudaega seongseoui baegseongdeul-ege modeun seong-yag-eul gajyeoonda haedo geudeul eun geudaeui gidoui banghyang-eul ttaleuji anh-eul geos-imyeo ttohan geudaedo geudeul-ui gidoui banghyang-eul ttaleuji anh-eul geos-i la geudeul-eun seologa seoloui gidoui banghyang-eul ttaleuji anhdoda jihyega geu daeege on huedo man-yag geudeul-ui hoemang-e ttaleundamyeon geudae tto han umaehan ja jung-ui han salam-i doel geos-ila
